title: [突發] 當撈侵政府對俄羅斯政商寡頭實施制裁

replies.msg:
《華爾街日報》引述消息人士稱，美國特朗普政府周五將對俄羅斯一些執政高層實施制裁，在莫斯科干預2016年美國大選後，國會授權政府採取一直以來承諾的懲罰行動。

據知情人士透露，在上月前俄羅斯雙面間諜父女在英國遭神經毒劑襲擊事件之前，美國已計劃對俄羅斯的執政高層實施制裁；但新的措施可能引發西方國家與俄羅斯之間的外交危機進一步加劇。

另一名高級國家安全官員稱，美國政府準備採取一系列行動，以還擊俄羅斯的強勢態度，當中部分將是公開行動，部分則是秘密行動。

FT:

US imposes sweeping sanctions on Russian business

The United States imposed new economic sanctions on senior Russian politicians, companies and business leaders Friday, citing a list of complaints including Moscow’s attempts to undermine Western democracies, support of separatists in Ukraine and its backing for Syrian President Bashar al-Assad.

The new economic sanctions — the Trump administration’s most aggressive action against Kremlin-connected individuals — target 17 Russian government officials, a state-owned weapons trading company, and seven so-called oligarchs and 12 companies affiliated with them.
